column4: hello all. i need some help getting my epson 670 printer to work.  i'm a novice to ubuntu, but love it so far.  is anyone available to help me through step by step rather than just saying "cups" to me please?
nobody seems to b able to help when i come in here. :(
hehe. i doubt it. not for the people who know what they're doing
- i'm looking to install /get it to work - my epson stylus 670 printer
on your webrowser do this..   localhost:631  and click on the add printer
- ok, now got name, location, description
where ever you or what ever you like to describe it
- give me now "device for epson670" do i select parallel port epson?
match it to what kind of interface you have
-now gives me lots of models that do not match my printer
match it to what kind of interface you have..or closes to the model you have
sometimes you may have to try and try til you get the right combo for non supported printer
oh well, time to pull the manual out of the box, or google it
